param.name: itemslimit
param.label: Number of studies to display
param.description: Enter a number of studies to display in each listing page

param.name: studieslisttemplateid
param.label: Template for Studies List View
param.description: Choose a template from the admin/templates for display of studies list view linked from here

param.name: detailstemplateid
param.label: Template for Study Details
param.description: Choose a template from the admin/templates for display of study details view linked from here

param.name: teachertemplateid
param.label: Template for Teacher View
param.description: Choose a template from the admin/templates for display of teacher details view linked from here

param.name: serieslisttemplateid
param.label: Template for Series List View
param.description: Choose a template from the admin/templates for display of the series list

param.name: seriesdetailtemplateid
param.label: Template for Series Detail View
param.description: Choose a template from the admin/templates for display of the series detail

param.name: teacher_id
param.label: Teacher
param.description: Choose a teacher to display for this menu item

param.name: mult_teachers
param.label: Enter multiple teacher ids
param.description: Enter a series of teacher ids separated by commas as a filter

param.name: series_id
param.label: Series
param.description: Choose a series to display for this menu item

param.name: mult_series
param.label: Enter multiple series ids
param.description: Enter a number of series ids separated by commas as a filter

param.name: booknumber
param.label: Book
param.description: Choose a Book to display for this menu item

param.name: mult_books
param.label: Enter multiple booknumber ids
param.description: Enter a series of book ids separated by commas as a filter

param.name: topic_id
param.label: Topic
param.description: Choose a topic to display for this menu item

param.name: mult_topics
param.label: Enter multiple topic ids
param.description: Enter a series of topic ids separated by commas as a filter

param.name: messagetype
param.label: Message Type
param.description: Choose a message type to display for this menu item

param.name: mult_messagetype
param.label: Enter multiple message type ids
param.description: Enter a series of message type ids separated by commas as a filter

param.name: locations
param.label: Locations
param.description: Choose a location to display for this menu item

param.name: mult_locations
param.label: Enter multiple location ids
param.description: Enter a series of location ids separated by commas as a filter

param.name: default_order
param.label: Default Date Ascending/Descending
param.description: Choose whether the default listing of studies should be in date ascending or descending order

param.name: show_page_image
param.label: Show/Hide Front Page Image
param.description: Shows or hides the image on the top of the component site front page

param.name: tooltip
param.label: Show/Hide Tooltip
param.description: Shows or hides a tooltip with details of your studies over the study details link

param.name: show_verses
param.label: Chapters/Verses
param.description: Choose whether just chapter(s) of Bible study book shown or verses too

param.name: stylesheet
param.label: Path to Your Stylesheet
param.description: Path from Joomla root to an alternate stylesheet (for advanced users only). Overrides page styles

param.name: date_format
param.label: Date format
param.description: Set the date display format

param.name: duration_type
param.label: Choose : or hours/min/sec
param.description: Choose a seperator for the duration, either : or hours/mins/secs

param.name: compatibilityMode
param.label: Compatibility Mode
param.description: Use the JoomlaOregon website to route media file downloads. Enable this only if you are experiencing download problems.

param.name: useavr
param.label: Use AllVideosReloaded for all media
param.description: If installed, use AllVideosReloaded 1.2.3 or higher player for all video and audio (overrides local settings)

param.name: popuptype
param.label: Window or light box (inline) for AVR player
param.description: If installed, use AllVideosReloaded as a separate window or as a light box effect

param.name: media_player
param.label: MP3 Media Player for all MP3s
param.description: Use built-in media player for all mp3 files (overrides AVR) and can be set for an individual study.

param.name: player_width
param.label: Width for MP3 Player
param.description: Width in pixels of internal MP3 player

param.name: show_filesize
param.label: Media Label
param.description: Choose a label for under the media file
param.option: Show Comment (if comment present) or Filesize (if no comment)

param.name: store_page
param.label: Virtuemart Display Page
param.description: If using Virtuemart item, setting for display page in url to store item.

param.name: show_page_title
param.label: Show/Hide Listing Page Title
param.description: Choose whether to show or hide the listing page title

param.name: page_title
param.label: Title for Listing Page
param.description: Text to use as title for listing page

param.name: use_headers_list
param.label: Header Row on Study List
param.description: Choose whether a header row will appear at the top of the studies list

param.name: list_intro
param.label: List Introduction
param.description: Enter some text to use as an introduction to your list page

param.name: intro_show
param.label: Show/Hide Intro
param.description: Choose whether to hide or show the listing introduction text

param.name: list_teacher_show
param.label: Show/Hide Teachers
param.description: Choose whether to hide or show the teachers identified below on the studieslist page

param.name: listteachers
param.label: Ids of teachers on list page
param.description: Enter a comma separated list of teacher ids to show on the list page

param.name: teacherlink
param.label: Show link to teacher details page
param.description: Creates a link out of the teacher name to their details page

param.name: details_text
param.label: Alt tag for details
param.description: Text to show on mouse over of details image link other than if you choose a tooltip

param.name: show_book_search
param.label: Show/Hide book search
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down box for books

param.name: show_teacher_search
param.label: Show/Hide Teacher search
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down box for teachers

param.name: show_series_search
param.label: Show/Hide Series search
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down box for series

param.name: show_type_search
param.label: Show/Hide Message Type search
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down box for message types

param.name: show_year_search
param.label: Show/Hide Year search
param.description: Shows or hides the year drop down box

param.name: show_order_search
param.label: Show/Hide Ascending/Descending
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down for ordering the year display

param.name: show_topic_search
param.label: Show/Hide Topic search
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down topical list

param.name: show_locations_search
param.label: Show/Hide Locations search
param.description: Shows or hides the drop down locations list

param.name: show_print_view
param.label: Show/Hide Print Button
param.description: Shows or hides the print button

param.name: show_pdf_view
param.label: Show/Hide PDF Button
param.description: Shows or hides the PDF button

param.name: show_teacher_view
param.label: Show/Hide Teacher
param.description: Shows or hides the Teacher

param.name: show_passage_view
param.label: Show/Hide Passage in Study View footer
param.description: Shows the passage referenced in the Scripture of your study. Right now only ESV available

param.name: use_headers_view
param.label: Header Row on Study Detail
param.description: Choose whether a header row will appear at the top of the study detail

param.name: list_items_view
param.label: Choose Display Items
param.description: Choose whether to show the same items as the list page, nothing, or just media

param.name: title_line_1
param.label: Item to show on title line 1
param.description: Choose an item to show on the first line of the Title line of the study details

param.name: customtitle1
param.label: Custom Title 1
param.description: Use same items in {} and text as in custom list display

param.name: title_line_2
param.label: Item to show on title line 2
param.description: Choose an item to show on the second line of the Title line of the study details

param.name: customtitle2
param.label: Custom Title 2
param.description: Use same items in {} and text as in custom list display

param.name: view_link
param.label: Show link to studies list
param.description: Choose whether to have a link back to the studies list

param.name: link_text
param.label: Text to show on bottom details page link to list
param.description: Put in text to show on the bottom of the study details page as a link back to the listing page.

param.name: show_scripture_link
param.label: Use Content Plugins
param.description: Choose whether to apply content plugins on study text. You can use the Scripturelinks plugin for all references in study text, for example.

param.name: show_comments
param.label: Allow comments for studies
param.description: Turns on or off the ability for users to leave comments on studies

param.name: comment_access
param.label: Access level for submitting comments
param.description: Set the level at which users can submit comments

param.name: comment_publish
param.label: Publishing comments
param.description: Choose whether posts are published automatically or approved on backend by admins

param.name: use_captcha
param.label: Use OSTWigits Captcha plugin for comments
param.description: Choose whether to use an image with text in it for users to enter before posting their comment. OSTWigits captcha plugin must be installed - go to the Joomla website and search for OSTWigits

param.name: email_comments
param.label: Email when comments entered
param.description: Set to yes if you want an email sent for every comment entered on studies

param.name: recipient
param.label: To Email address
param.description: Email address to notify. Leave empty to send to the system default email address. Specify multiple addresses by separating them with a comma.

param.name: teacher_title
param.label: List Page Title
param.description: Text to show on teacher list display page for title

param.name: show_teacher_studies
param.label: Show/Hide Teacher's Studies
param.description: Choose to show or hide the listing of latest studies by teacher in teacher display

param.name: studies
param.label: Number of Studies in Teacher's view
param.description: Type in the number of studies to show for each teacher in the teacher's view. Leave blank for all

param.name: label_teacher
param.label: Text for Latest Studies Line
param.description: Enter some text to show when displaying teacher latest studies

param.name: moduleitems
param.label: Number of studies to display
param.description: Enter a number of studies to display in the module

param.name: series_title
param.label: Title for Series List Page
param.description: Text to show at top of Series List Page

param.name: show_series_title
param.label: Show/Hide Series List Page Title
param.description: Show or hide the text for the top of the series list page.

param.name: show_page_image_series
param.label: Show/Hide Series Page Image
param.description: Show or hide the image for the top of the series list page. Same image as used for studies list page

param.name: series_show_description
param.label: Show/Hide Description along bottom
param.description: Choose to have a row spanning 4 columns showing the description of the series

param.name: series_characters
param.label: Character limit for description on list page
param.description: The number of characters to show in the description on the listing page. All description shown on the details link. Leave blank for all

param.name: search_series
param.label: Show/Hide Series Drop Down
param.description: Show or hide the drop down menu with all published series as a filter

param.name: series_limit
param.label: Series Per Page
param.description: Put in the number of series to show per page of results

param.name: serieselement1
param.label: Series List Element 1
param.description: Please pick an element from the list

param.name: seriesislink1
param.label: Link To
param.description: Select what type of link

param.name: serieselement2
param.label: Series List Element 2
param.description: Please pick an element from the list

param.name: seriesislink2
param.label: Link To
param.description: Select what type of link

param.name: serieselement3
param.label: Series List Element 3
param.description: Please pick an element from the list

param.name: seriesislink3
param.label: Link To
param.description: Select what type of link

param.name: serieselement4
param.label: Series List Element 4
param.description: Please pick an element from the list

param.name: seriesislink4
param.label: Link To
param.description: Select what type of link

param.name: series_detail_sort
param.label: Study sort column
param.description: Choose a study element to sort the studies list in the series detail section.

param.name: series_detail_order
param.label: Sort Order
param.description: Choose ascending or descending for the order of studies

param.name: series_detail_show_link
param.label: Show/Hide All Studies Link
param.description: Show or hide a link to all studies in a series if you have put in a limit

param.name: series_detail_limit
param.label: Number of studies to show
param.description: Choose a number of studies to show on the list. Leave blank for all. A link will be provided to the rest of the studies if limit set

param.name: series_list_return
param.label: Show Link Back to Series List
param.description: Show/Hide a link back to all Series at page bottom

param.name: series_detail_1
param.label: Series Study List Element 1
param.description: Choose an element to show on the studies list in the series detail view

param.name: series_detail_islink1
param.label: Link to Study Details
param.description: Choose whether this is a link to the study details

param.name: series_detail_2
param.label: Series Study List Element 2
param.description: Choose an element to show on the studies list in the series detail view

param.name: series_detail_islink2
param.label: Link to Study Details
param.description: Choose whether this is a link to the study details

param.name: series_detail_3
param.label: Series Study List Element 3
param.description: Choose an element to show on the studies list in the series detail view

param.name: series_detail_islink3
param.label: Link to Study Details
param.description: Choose whether this is a link to the study details

param.name: series_detail_4
param.label: Series Study List Element 4
param.description: Choose an element to show on the studies list in the series detail view

param.name: series_detail_islink4
param.label: Link to Study Details
param.description: Choose whether this is a link to the study details

param.name: tip_title
param.label: ToolTip Title
param.description: Type in a title for the ToolTip

param.label: ToolTip Label 1
param.description: Type in a label for this ToolTip item

param.label: Tool Tip Item 1
